titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain employee-funded pensions created before June 25, 1959, in the same manner as qualified trusts for purposes of unrelated debt-financed income derived from real property, and to increase the limitation on elective deferrals to such employee-funded pensions.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain employee-funded pensions created before June 25, 1959, in the same manner as qualified trusts for purposes of unrelated debt-financed income derived from real property, and to increase the limitation on elective deferrals to such employee-funded pensions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) exempt certain tax-exempt employee-funded pension plans created before June 25, 1959, from rules imposing a tax on unrelated debt-financed income derived from real property; and (2) make the limits on contributions to such employee-funded pension plans equal to the limits allowed for other tax-exempt retirement accounts.
